primitive_armor1.description: A flimsily assembled armor made of wood parts and tree bark pieces.
primitive_armor1.flavor: It's time for our enemies to suffer as our foresters do.

primitive_armor2.description: A suit of body armor created with overheated, hard ceramic plates.
primitive_armor2.flavor: 'You may not pass.' says the Teapot Knight.

primitive_helm1.description: A piece of headgear made out of wood and bark.
primitive_helm1.flavor: Bearded goblins shall inflict certain head strikes.

primitive_helm2.description: A protective piece of ceramic armor for the head.
primitive_helm2.flavor: 'Darling, have you seen my garden pot?'

primitive_shield1.description: A large chunk of tree bark used as a shield.

primitive_shield2.description: An improvised shield made of hard ceramic.

primitive_spear1.description: A crude spear shaved from a hard wood stick.
primitive_spear1.flavor: The pointy end goes towards the wolves.

primitive_spear2.description: A spear crafted with a piece of sharpened flint.

primitive_hatchet.description: A small axe assembled with a stone headpiece.
primitive_hatchet.flavor: 'But Workers already carry a metal hatchet' said no Hearthling ever.

primitive_dagger.description: A ceremonial dagger made with hard ceramic.

primitive_sling.description: A very simple yet effective tool for hurling stones.

bag_of_stones.description: Gotta carry some stones for that sling!

primitive_bola.description: This weapon has a very low damage but a good chance of snaring the target in place.

bag_of_bolas.description: Might need a couple of extra ones.
